IndexTotalFieldsLimit.title: Maximum number of fields in an index

TokenFilter.title: Token filter
TokenFilter.description: Select which token filter should be used when indexing searchable fields (requires rebuilding an index)

MinGram.title: Min Gram
MinGram.description: Minimum number of characters in a gram (requires rebuilding an index)

MaxGram.title: Max Gram
MaxGram.description: Maximum number of characters in a gram (requires rebuilding an index)

DeleteDuplicateIndexes.title: Delete duplicate active indexes
DeleteDuplicateIndexes.description: Search and delete duplicate active indexes before Delete and build operation

SemanticPipelineName.title: Semantic pipeline name
SemanticPipelineName.description: Semantic model pipeline name. Produces embeddings generated by the model on data indexing.

SemanticFieldName.title: Semantic field name
SemanticFieldName.description: Semantic model field name. Contains embeddings produced by the semantic pipeline. X.tokens or X.predicted_value

SemanticVectorModelDimensions.title: Vector model dimensions number
SemanticVectorModelDimensions.description: Number of dimensions of the third party vector model. Typicaly found in the model description.
